Bash(gh pr create --title "Add Ref Readiness Dashboard - Oura-style Performance OS" --body "$(cat <<''EOF''
## Summary

This PR adds a comprehensive **Ref Readiness Dashboard** that transforms RuleVision from a quiz app into a full performance operating system for basketball referees (like Oura for refs).

### Features

**Ref Readiness Score (0-100)** with three pillars:
- **Game IQ** (82): Category mastery heatmap by difficulty, concept coverage
- **Decision Execution** (74): Pressure vs calm accuracy, composure curve, clutch situations  
- **Commitment** (88): Consistency metrics, training load, mode breakdown, focus quality

**Dashboard Components:**
- Animated circular ring visualizations (Oura-style)
- Hero Strip with readiness score, pillar mini-rings, and daily stats
- Strengths/Weaknesses analysis with trend indicators
- 14-Day Focus Plan with auto-generated goals and actions
- Time views: Day, Week, and Season with trend charts

**Technical:**
- Dashboard API endpoint with full data aggregation
- Answer tracking hook for all game modes with response time
- Supabase schema for comprehensive analytics
- Dummy data for dashboard preview/demo mode
- Updated all game modes to track answers

## Test plan
- [ ] Visit `/dashboard` to see the full dashboard with demo data
- [ ] Visit `/dashboard?demo=true` to see demo mode badge
- [ ] Test Film Room, Sudden Death, Daily 5, Category Drill - all should track answers
- [ ] Check Day/Week/Season time view switcher
- [ ] Verify responsive layout on mobile
